verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בַּצָּרָ֣תָה <S%H6869><s%> In my distress לִּ֑י קָ֝רָ֗אתִי <S%H7121><s%> I cried וַֽיַּעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> and he heard

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD הַצִּ֣ילָה <S%H5337><s%> Deliver נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> my soul מִשְּׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> lips שֶׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> from lying מִלָּשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> tongue רְמִיָּֽה׃ <S%H7423><s%> [and] from a deceitful

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What יִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> What shall be given לְ֭ךָ וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> and what יֹּסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> unto thee? or what shall be done לָ֗ךְ לָשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> babbler רְמִיָּֽה׃ <S%H7423><s%> unto thee thou false
חִצֵּ֣י <S%H2671><s%> arrows גִבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty שְׁנוּנִ֑ים <S%H8150><s%> Sharp עִ֝֗ם <S%H5973><s%> With גַּחֲלֵ֥י <S%H1513><s%> with coals רְתָמִֽים׃ <S%H7574><s%> of juniper

אֽוֹיָה־ <S%H190><s%> Woe לִ֭י כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גַ֣רְתִּי <S%H1481><s%> is me that I sojourn מֶ֑שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> in Mesech שָׁ֝כַ֗נְתִּי <S%H7931><s%> [that] I dwell עִֽם־ <S%H5973><s%> among אָהֳלֵ֥י <S%H168><s%> in the tents קֵדָֽר׃ <S%H6938><s%> of Kedar
רַ֭בַּת <S%H7227><s%> hath long שָֽׁכְנָה־ <S%H7931><s%> dwelt לָּ֣הּ נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> My soul עִ֝֗ם <S%H5973><s%> who שׂוֹנֵ֥א <S%H8130><s%> with him that hateth שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> peace

אֲ‍ֽנִי־ <S%H589><s%> I am שָׁ֭לוֹם <S%H7965><s%> I [am for] peace וְכִ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> but when I speak הֵ֝֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> are for לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> they [are] for war
